title: App incompatible with Xperia Z3 Compact with Android 4.4.4
body:
> Note: The app works with devices using iOS 8.3 or newer or Android 4.1.1 or newer (API 16).

So... Why I can't install the app on my phone? There's a bug?

Tks.

replies.body:
And now the app is out in Europe! Please use the download links from the announcement and let me know if you're still having issues! 

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app

Ugh, sorry about this friends. This is NOT due to your phone being incompatible (that's a generic Play Store error message); this is due to the fact that we haven't released in Europe yet. :( 

The good news is we will be releasing in Europe in the next few weeks and that error should disappear.
